MAIN_MESSAGE: There are issues with the power in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.00pm. Our engineers have arrived on site in the local area and the team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45pm on Sunday, 25 October 2020
